nodes.text: The Massacre of Myomar was an atrocity perpetrated by the Imperial Grand Admiral Ishin-Il-Raz. Sometime between 2 BBY and the Battle of Endor in 4 ABY, Il-Raz sought to earn favor from Galactic Emperor Palpatine through a series of military actions, which included the bombardment of Shalam and the attack against the inhabitants of the planet Myomar in the Expansion Region. Commanding the massacre from his Star Destroyer, the Emperor's Disciple, Il-Raz secured an Imperial victory on Myomar, along with extensive civilian casualties.
The Massacre of Myomar was first mentioned in the article "Who's Who: Imperial Grand Admirals," written by Daniel Wallace and Abel G. Peña and published in Star Wars Insider 66 in 2003.
